item.title: 股票交易者驾驭中国阅兵式指南
item.description: 周三，中国在北京举行阅兵式，中国战斗机制造商、机器人公司和其他国防相关企业的股票成为焦点。【原文：Shares of Chinese fighter-jet makers, robotics companies and other defense-related firms are in the spotlight as the nation holds a military parade in Beijing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通将加强在印度的企业银行业务，促进投资跃升
item.description: 摩根大通公司正在加强其在印度的企业银行业务，重点关注电动汽车、数据中心和太阳能等行业，因为这些行业的企业正在全球增长最快的主要经济体增加资本支出。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is strengthening its corporate banking presence in India, focusing on sectors such as electric vehicles, data centers, and solar energy, as firms in these industries ramp up capital spending in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 受降息押注和债务担忧影响，黄金在飙升至创纪录水平后保持坚挺
item.description: 由于美国降息的前景提升了黄金的吸引力，而且交易者在股市和债市大跌后寻求安全，黄金在周二保持了连续六天的涨势，并将价格推高至历史新高。【原文：Gold held a six-day rally that pushed prices to an all-time high on Tuesday, as the prospect of US interest-rate cuts boosted the metal’s appeal and traders sought safety following a selloff in equity and bond markets.】

item.title: 交易商权衡地缘政治风险和欧佩克+政策，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）供应会议召开之前，投资者权衡了一系列地缘政治风险，包括美国对俄罗斯的制裁可能升级。【原文：Oil steadied after closing at the highest in a month as investors weighed a host of geopolitical risks, including a potential escalation of US sanctions on Russian flows, in the run-up to an OPEC+ meeting on supply.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会和商品期货交易委员会工作人员提供登记现货加密资产交易的途径
item.description: 华尔街的两位最高监管者告诉联邦注册交易所的运营商，他们已准备好帮助美国市场进一步向数字资产开放，上市某些现货加密产品并不在禁止之列。【原文：Signaling their readiness to help further open US markets to digital assets, two of Wall Street’s top regulators told operators of federally registered exchanges that listing certain spot crypto products isn’t prohibited.】

item.title: 石破茂的重要盟友计划退出，日本股市开盘将走低
item.description: 日本首相石破茂的主要权力掮客宣布有意辞职后，石破茂的地位受到质疑，日元走软，日本股票期货下跌，表明东京股市开盘低迷。【原文：Japan’s stock futures fell, pointing to a muted open in Tokyo, after Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s key power broker announced his intention to resign, casting doubt over Ishiba’s position and weakening the yen.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债权人提交拯救该公司的修订计划
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司的一个高级债权人小组已向英国监管机构提交了一份新的运营计划，作为拯救和接管这家濒临破产的公用事业公司的努力的一部分。【原文：A group of Thames Water’s senior creditors has submitted a new operational plan to the UK regulator as part of its bid to rescue and take over the ailing utility.】

item.title: 游说团体称英国面临北海油气承包商外流风险
item.description: 一个游说团体警告说，英国的石油和天然气生产商已经饱受高税收和产量下降之苦，现在还面临着设备和服务供应商撤出业务的紧迫风险。【原文：UK oil and gas producers — already suffering from high taxes and waning output — now also face the imminent risk of being hit by a pullback in operations by equipment and services suppliers, a lobby group warned.】

item.title: 中国富人重拾高风险 "滚雪球 "式衍生品获取收益
item.description: 在监管机构限制 "滚雪球 "衍生产品一年之后，中国富人再次将资金投入到 "滚雪球 "衍生产品中，以获取更丰厚的回报。【原文：China’s wealthy are once again pouring money into “snowball” derivatives for juicier returns, a year after the regulator curbed the product that was blamed for exacerbating a stock rout.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随华尔街跌势：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将延续美国股市的疲软态势，美国股市在公司债券抛售潮和发达国家预算忧虑的影响下与债券齐跌。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to mirror a weak US session, where equities fell alongside bonds amid a rush of corporate-debt sales and worries over developed-world budgets.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司能够抵御贸易战，并将印度视为重要市场

item.title: 卡夫亨氏分拆计划引发穆迪降级审查

item.description: 芬兰政府就明年的预算达成一致，努力解决不断膨胀的债务问题，并启动欧洲最弱经济体之一的经济增长。【原文：Finland’s government agreed on a budget for next year as it strives to address ballooning debt and kickstart growth in one of Europe’s weakest economies.】

item.description: 华盛顿的一名联邦法官可能不会在9月4日之前就唐纳德-特朗普总统罢免美联储理事丽莎-库克一案做出裁决，因为他给了政府更多的时间来提交该案的论据。【原文：A federal judge in Washington likely won’t rule before Sept. 4 in the fight over President Donald Trump’s move to oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook after giving the government more time to submit arguments in the case.】

item.title: 苹果公司机器人技术首席人工智能研究员转投 Meta 公司，成为其最新离职计划的一部分
item.description: 苹果公司负责机器人技术的首席人工智能研究员已经离职，加入了 Meta Platforms 公司的竞争团队，这也是这家 iPhone 制造商人工智能人才外流的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc.’s lead artificial intelligence researcher for robotics has departed the company to join Meta Platforms Inc.’s competing effort, part of an exodus of AI talent from the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 2025 年住宅 ETF 流入量以二比一的比例超过共同基金
item.description: 与专注于该资产类别的传统共同基金相比，市政债券交易所交易基金今年吸引的现金量增加了一倍多，这凸显出 ETF 作为该领域的投资工具越来越受欢迎。【原文：Municipal bond exchange-traded funds drew more than double the amount of cash this year compared to traditional mutual funds focused on the asset class, highlighting the growing popularity of ETFs as an investment vehicle in the space.】

item.title: 如果美联储降息，柴油涨势将延续至秋季
item.description: 分析师说，如果美联储本月降息，柴油的夏季涨势可能会延续到秋季，从而推动以这种主力燃料为动力的工业活动。【原文：Diesel’s summer rally may extend into the fall if the Fed cuts interest rates this month, bolstering industrial activity powered by the workhorse fuel, analysts say.】

item.title: OpenAI 将以 11 亿美元收购产品测试初创公司 Statsig
item.description: OpenAI 同意以 11 亿美元的价格收购产品测试初创公司 Statsig，该公司表示，这是 ChatGPT 制造商历史上最大的收购案之一。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to buy product testing startup Statsig for $1.1 billion in an all-stock deal, the company said, marking one of the largest acquisitions in the ChatGPT maker’s history.】

item.title: 特朗普将审查马萨诸塞州海上风电场的批准情况
item.description: 特朗普政府计划重新考虑颁发给马萨诸塞州沿海一个大型风力发电场的许可证，这是其针对清洁能源资源的最新行动。【原文：The Trump administration plans to reconsider a permit issued to a large wind farm off the coast of Massachusetts, the latest move in its targeted campaign against the clean energy resource.】

item.title: 摩根大通修订 2025 年垃圾货币利差、收益率和回报率目标
item.description: 强劲而有韧性的基本面、旺盛的需求、有限的新增供应以及对美国最早将于本月降息的预期，都促使摩根大通修订了其对 2025 年垃圾债券利差、收益率、回报率和供应量的目标。【原文：Strong and resilient fundamentals, robust demand, limited new supply amid expectations of a US rate cut as early as this month have all led JPMorgan to revise its target for spreads on junk bonds, their yield, returns and supply for 2025.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制使用量跌至 2021 年以来新低
item.description: 随着投资者和银行在本月底之后将资金重新投入工作，作为投资组合再平衡的一部分，对美联储一项主要机制的需求降至四年多来的最低水平。【原文：Demand for a major Federal Reserve facility dropped to the lowest level in more than four years as investors and banks put money back to work as part of portfolio rebalancing after the end of the month.】
